mapper.insert: insert into t_baby_require_items (id, item_code, item_name, item_price, require_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{requireCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, item_code, item_name, item_price, require_code from t_baby_require_items
mapper.delete: delete from t_baby_require_items where id IN #{item}
